meanings.definition: Skijorers: people who participate in the sport of skijoring.
meanings.sent1: The skijorers raced down the snowy track with their skis.
meanings.sent2: Many skijorers gathered at the event to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent3: The skijorers laughed as they zoomed past each other on the icy course.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, the skijorers were like graceful snow dancers.
meanings.sent5: The group of skijorers left a trail of excitement behind them.

meanings.definition: Skijorers: the plural form of skijorer, referring to individuals who are pulled on skis by a horse or dog.
meanings.sent1: The skijorers held on tight as the dog pulled them through the snow.
meanings.sent2: During the race, the skijorers navigated the course with skill and agility.
meanings.sent3: The skijorers cheered on their furry companions as they raced together.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the skijorers and their animal partners glided gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The bond between skijorers and their animal teammates was truly special.
